But <S%G3588>this<s%> man, <S%G1223>because<s%> he <S%G3306>continues<s%> <S%G165>ever,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G531>unchangeable<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood.<s%>

<S%G3606>Why<s%> he is <S%G1410>able<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> them to the <S%G3838>uttermost<s%> that <S%G4334>come<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> by him, seeing he <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> to <S%G1793>make<s%> <S%G1793>intercession<s%> for them.
